resources.string:
Gabay is designed to revolutionize the way you
 manage your travel expenses. Whether you're
 planning a weekend getaway or a long-term
 adventure, our app helps you stay organized, on
 budget, and focused on enjoying your journey.

At Gabay, our mission is to provide travelers with a
 seamless and efficient way to track their expenses,
 manage trips, and stay within budget. We believe
 that financial clarity is key to a stress-free travel
 experience, and we are committed to making that a
 reality for our users.

string.name: motto
string.i: Your personal financial guide in \n every “Gastos sa Paglalakbay”

resources.string:
Gabay is designed with simplicity in
 mind, ensuring that users can easily
 navigate through various features and
 functionalities.

Log your expenses effortlessly with
 detailed descriptions, dates,
 amounts, and categories
Create and manage multiple trips,\n each with its own budget and expense\n tracking.
Personalize your expense categories\n with custom names and icons for easy\n identification

Gabay is more than just an app; it's a commitment to
 helping you travel smarter. We strive to provide you
 with the best tools to manage your expenses, so you
 can focus on what truly matters—the adventure.

Our team consists of passionate developers,
 designers, and travel enthusiasts dedicated to
 making your travel experience as smooth as possible.
 We continuously work on improving Gabay to meet
 your needs and exceed your expectations.

b.i: “Thank you for choosing Gabay. Here\'s to stress-free travels and well-managed budgets!”

resources.string: Feel free to reach out to us with any questions or\n feedback. Happy travels!
